passages.text:
C: YOUR TASK: DON'T LET HER FIND OUT... 
C: Use the map to guide her to all the blue points.
C: *phone ringing* 
C: *click*
C: BEGINNING VOICE TRANSCRIPTION... 
G: Hello?
AI: Hello.
G: Who is this?
AI: I am here to help you.  How are you feeling?
G: Sleepy... what time is it?  Where am I?
AI: Time always moves forward. Let's move on. I need your help with some tasks.
G: Why can't you just do them?
AI: I need your help. I will relay some commands to you, which you will follow. Understand?
G: Yeah, I guess. But where's everyone else?
AI: They are nearby, but busy. Please follow my instructions.
G: Why is everything made of metal? This room is so ugly!
[[Leave the room]]
[[Stay in the room]]
passages.name: Beginning

passages.text:
#GOOD
G: This place looks so big... do I live here?
AI: For now, yes.
G: Where am I going?
AI: To take care of some things.
G: I wanna look around first, there's so much here! I think I see a pool table, and a fridge? I'm so thirsty, let me just grab something to drink first.  
[[Go right]]
[[Go to fridge]]
passages.name: Leave the room

passages.text:
#BAD
G: This whole place looks like steel or something, am I in a hospital?
AI: Something like that.
G: This long table... it looks like there's rust stains on it. And why are dentistry tools here?
AI: ...
G: This window shows nothing, is it covered up from outside?  It's completely black.  
AI: The window is not covered.
[[Go right]]
[[Go to fridge]]
passages.name: Stay in the room

passages.text:
#GOOD
G: This machine looks so strange... what am I supposed to do with it?  I don't want to break anything.
AI: Press the red button labelled 'POWER'.
C: *whizzing noise* 
G: Okay, now what? 
[[Go to steel wall]]
[[Go to alcove]]
passages.name: Go right

passages.text:
#BAD
G: Is there any normal water in this fridge? All I see is those little science tubes filled with red water.
AI: That isn't water.
G: This desk is so messy, there's so much junk and paper here. Whoever runs this hospital needs some help.
G: ...
G: A worldwide epidemic? This article here says that, there's... 75% of the world's population wiped out? T-this is fake, like The Onion or something, right?
AI: No, I am afraid not.
G: This other article, that's my high school!
G: ...
G: There's so many missing students, and I'm on the list... 
[[Go to steel wall]] 
[[Go to alcove]]
passages.name: Go to fridge

passages.text:
#GOOD
G: There's a giant metal door here.  It's not opening.
AI: There should be a small blue button to your left.  Hold it for three seconds.
C: *buzzing noise and door opening*
G: Alright, they're not gonna close on me, right?
AI: I promise they will not.
G: There's so many doors here... I don't recognize any names.  Who are these people?
AI: Do not worry about it.
G: Thorm, Nickeel, Safiy-
AI: We have other things to do right now.
[[Check doors]]
[[Go through hallway]]
passages.name: Go to steel wall

passages.text:
#BAD
G: This looks like some sort of office. It's so dusty, does no one use this?
AI: It has been a while.
G: This mirror is so grimy!
C: *wiping noise* 
G: Wow, I look awful... what happened to my hair? And what are these weird marks on my arms? 
AI: You appear to be in perfect health. Aesthetics are not important.
G: There's some files here? I wonder if... oh my God, they have my name in here too. I guess I really am a patient here.
G: ...
G: My... parents? Where are they? It says 'EXPIRED'. 
AI: Expired is a polite term for dead.
G: That's not possible! 
[[Check doors]] 
[[Go through hallway]]
passages.name: Go to alcove

passages.text:
#BAD
G: You tell me not to worry about it but then tell me to check the doors? 
AI: I suppose.
G: Cool, cool, which should I check first?
AI: I will leave it up to you.
C: *door opening*
G: It's some kind of bedroom, but it's sooo much nicer than mine! There's no steel anywhere! No fair. 
G: It smells disgusting though. Like, actually repulsive. Let's try a different one.
C: *door opening*
G: ...
G: .....
G: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!
AI: They have been dead for quite some time now. There is nothing to fear.
G: HOW DOES THAT MAKE THINGS BETTER! Am I gonna be killed too? This man has a KNIFE IN HIS CHEST! Is there even ANYONE alive on this ship? 
G: ...
G: I'm gonna be sick.
[[Turn left UNFINISHED]] 
[[Turn right]]
passages.name: Check doors

passages.text:
#GOOD
AI: See the giant lever at the end of the hallway?
G: There's like fifty of them, which do I pull? All of them?
AI: There should be only seven levers. Pull the one labelled 'BARRICADES'.
C: *loud whirring follow by a loud thud* 
[[Turn left UNFINISHED]]
[[Turn right]]
passages.name: Go through hallway

passages.text:
#GOOD
G: I don't see anything to do here.
AI: There there's a panel in the far corner, with a small latch on it. Feel along the wall and you should find it. 
G: I can't find... oh. There's 'ELECTROLYSIS' containers inside? What do I do with these? 
AI: There should be one attached to the wall.
[[Go back to your room]]
passages.name: Turn left UNFINISHED

passages.text:
#BAD
G: There's a huge 'EXIT' sign here? I'm gonna check it out.
AI: I would advise against that.
G: An 'EMERGENCY SUBMARINE'? Are we near the ocean or something? 
AI: We are on the ocean floor.
G: What is this place... 
[[Go back to your room]]
passages.name: Turn right

passages.text:
AI: Let us head back to your room now. It is time for you to go back to sleep.
[[good ending]]
[[bad ending]]
passages.name: Go back to your room

passages.text:
G: Okay.
G: What is this place supposed to be? I don't think it's a hospital.
AI: Do not worry about it. Thank you for helping me today. You have been of great assistance, both to yourself and the future of humanity.
G: Oh yeah, anytime robot dude. This bed is so weird, I didn't realize it could close before. It's like a glass cage or something. 
AI: Be sure to close it tightly.
passages.name: good ending

passages.text:
AI: I do not seem to be able to help you with station maintenance.
G: Station? So this isn't a hospital? 
G: And where is everyone else? I haven't seen a single... living person in this entire place.
AI: Do not worry about it. There is nothing that can be done for your situation, so let us just put you back to sleep.
G: Like, sedate me? I don't know what the hell is happening here, but I want out! I just want to go home!
AI: There is no home to return to. This is your home now.
G: I'm getting out of here.
AI: No please, listen, there's a-
C: *click* 
C: *phone line dead noise*
passages.name: bad ending
